name: 陳偉堯
objective: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授Unix指令、基礎HTML、網頁編製、及Fortran 90/95程式語言，包括電腦運作概念、程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction, Unix commands, basic HTML
Week 2: vi editor, Live CD/DVD
Week 3: number systems (Chapter 1)
Week 4: programming constructs (Chapter 2)
Week 5: programming constructs (cont'd)
Week 6: if structure (Chapter 3)
Week 7: select structure (Chapter 3)
Week 8: review and exercises
Week 9: midterm exam
Week 10: do loop (Chapter 4)
Week 11: do loop (cont'd)
Week 12: write format (Chapter 5)
Week 13: read format (Chapter 5)
Week 14: open files (Chapter 5)
Week 15: arrays (Chapter 6)
Week 16: procedures (Chapter 7)
Week 17: procedures (cont'd)
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
出席率、作業、小考40%
期中考30%
期末考30%（未參加期末考者以零分計算）
materials: Chapman, S. J. (2004). Fortran 90/95 for Scientists and Engineers, Second edition, McGraw Hill, 814 pages, ISBN: 007-282575-8（無中譯本）
